title: Hackerspace Design
abstract: Panel discussion regarding how to build succesful communities, based on the recent publication of the "Hackerspace Blueprint".
description:
We discuss common pitfalls of do-ocracy and hackerspace communities, and how to avoid them.

* How to resolve interpersonal conflict.
* The value and dangers of meetings.
* How to give power to the people who do stuff.
* Rules, lack of rules and loopholes.
* Negative effects of lack of structure.
* How to get people interested.
* How [the hackerspace blueprint](https://hackerspace.design) can help you build a better community
* Inclusion and kicking people out.

and much more..
